svg.text: title: "December 7, 2018" date: "2018-12-07"

* Embark 4.0.0-alpha.2

Ecosystem
* ConsenSys reorg from 1.0 to 2.0 included 13% layoffs .
ConsenSys reorg from 1.0 to 2.0 included 13% layoffs .

Kyber, AirSwap, and Cryptokitties.
Curious Giraffe has some nice dapp analytics for Compound, Augur, ENS, etheroll,
* In 2019, Gnosis will give away up to 600k USD to build on Gnosis product s through
its ecosystem fund

ecosystem fund

200-300k gas with eip1108
More on AZTEC Protocol’s confidential transactions . Plus costs would go down to
Live on mainnet
* slow.trade is live on mainnet ; it builds on the DutchX protocol by Gnosis
slow.trade is live on mainnet ; it builds on the DutchX protocol by Gnosis
* Havven launches stablecoins for EUR, JPY, AUD, KRW, and gold .
Havven launches stablecoins for EUR, JPY, AUD, KRW, and gold .

FOAM Signaling live on mainnet
Enterprise
* SignatureBank to offer commercial clients 24/7 money transfer for free using a
private Ethereum chain
Governance and Standards
* Latest core devs call . Lane’s notes . Fork will be around Jan 16th. Working group
updates. Dropping Ropsten/PoW testnets forever?

with Erasure, and decentalizing it.

Update on ETC<>ETH peace relay
* Coinbase filed to trademark buidl, though Balaji pledges it will only be defensive .
Coinbase filed to trademark buidl, though Balaji pledges it will only be defensive .
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note (new in bold ):
* Dec 9 - Neufund equity token offering (closes after a week)
Dec 9 - Neufund equity token offering (closes after a week)
* Jan 10 - Mobi Grand Challenge hackathon ends
Jan 10 - Mobi Grand Challenge hackathon ends
* Jan ~16 - Constantinople hard fork at block 7080000
Jan ~16 - Constantinople hard fork at block 7080000
* Jan 29-30 - AraCon (Berlin)
Jan 29-30 - AraCon (Berlin)
* Feb 7-8 - Melonport’s M1 conf (Zug)
Feb 7-8 - Melonport’s M1 conf (Zug)
* Feb 15-17 - ETHDenver hackathon (ETHGlobal) next hacker application round closes
December 31st
Feb 15-17 - ETHDenver hackathon (ETHGlobal) next hacker application round closes
* Feb 23-25 - EthAustin hackathon (EthUniversal)
Feb 23-25 - EthAustin hackathon (EthUniversal)
* Mar 5-7 - EthCC (Paris)
Mar 5-7 - EthCC (Paris)
* Mar 27 - Infura end of legacy key support (Jan 23 begins Project ID prioritization)
Mar 27 - Infura end of legacy key support (Jan 23 begins Project ID prioritization)
If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys .
I own Week In Ethereum. Editorial control has always been 100% me. If you’re unhappy
with editorial decisions or anything that I have written in this issue, feel free to
tweet at me . [Although I can’t answer right now to due to censorship, see below.]
Capricious Twitter censorship
One of my best friends launched Stoop , an Android / iOS newsletter reader. It uses a
dedicated email and clean design experience to keep your information diet healthy. If
you subscribe to newsletters, you will like it.
For reasons unknown, Twitter has locked my @evan_van_ness account . After Mailchimp
arbitrarily banned me earlier this year, it’s sad to see web2.0 platforms making the
case for their own demise. Web3 can’t come fast enough .
I’m sure that I missed things for this newsletter due to Twitter’s banhammer. Sorry!
If you’re wondering “ why didn’t my post make it into Week in Ethereum ?”
Week in Ethereum News
